transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji sir, abhi maine aapko whatsapp pe bheja hai sir.
Customer: Kaunse number pe bheja hai?
Executive: 79 wale pe.
Customer: 79 nahi, ye wale number pe bhejo na. Jispe hum baat kar rahe hai.
Executive: 79 pe hi hai sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.

Executive: Line pe rahiye sir, bhej raha hu.
Customer: Okay.


Customer: Ye number pe mai contact bhi kar sakta hu, save kar du na ye number?
Executive: Ji sir, abhi aapke paas aaya hoga.
Customer: Aah, aa gayi link, hmm.

Executive: Yes sir. Toh
Customer: System pe aawaz aa rahi hai ki nahi sir?
Executive: Mobile pe aa rahi hai, system pe nahi aayegi abhi, mai computer system hai usme mera speaker kharab ho gaya hai.
Executive: Oh ho, okay okay. Toh just mai ek baar open kar leta hu aapka profile.

Executive: Haan sir, ye aapka profile hai sir. Toh kaunsa product aapka inactive dikha raha hai, ek baar batayenge sir?
Customer: Ye dekho inactive dikha jo 78 7 likha raha hai, dekho inactive pe click kijiye.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Isme kya kya hai, mai bata deta hu, isme jo hai na, ji ji.
Customer: Isme jaise immediate isme available nahi hai, sabse pehle jo hai na sabse aapko immediate add karna padega.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo kya hai ki isme, haan haan ek aur ek aur sir, IPR issue hai.
Customer: IPR issue? Ha toh matlab abhi hota hai ki ye jo hai na, haan IPR issue ka matlab ye hai ki illegal jo hai na matlab legal jo hai ispe koi kisi ne claim kiya hoga. Is product ko jo hai so aapne matlab aapke side se wo matlab wo uska koi images aapke sath paas added hoga ya fir trademark aapke paas nahi hoga aur usne claim kiya hoga isliye wo reject ho gaya.
Customer: Par ye toh galat hai na, ye hamara wo toh email ek aaya tha uspe humne wo wo bhi diya tha fir bhi ye kyu aisa kiya? Ye hamara product hai isme kuch koi wo hai nahi toh aap aise kaise hume bina bataye kar lete ho, pata nahi mujhe toh.
Executive: Sir actually kya hai ki aapke aapke side se jo hai na matlab jo legal wala jo concern hai na wo kisi ne sir aapka jo trademark hai iski wajah se wo ye hua hai sir. Ek baar mujhe thoda time dijiye mai ek baar check karke aapko call back karta hu sir exactly issue batata hu aapko.
Customer: Haan jaldi bataiye. Kyunki beech me hume pata chala tha ki IR technology walon ne kuch aapko mail kiya tha ki ye copyright ka case kiya hai but ye jo uska toh wo gaya tha IPR IR technology walon ka toh fir ye kyu aisa hua?
Executive: Mai check kar leta hu.

Executive: Haan. Kya hua tha sir ki jo isme jo link hai wo ek jo hai na matlab IR technology jo hai na ek hume ye jo product hai in sab pe usne jo hai na trademark bola tha ki hamara trademark hai. Thik hai? Hmm hmm hmm. Aur aapke aapko hum logon ne bola tha ki agar wo aapka images hai toh aap hume apna trademark share kijiye agar wo trademark match karta hai toh fir hum jo hai na usko aapka add kar denge kyunki humne aapko call bhi kiya tha earlier aur wo trademark ka certificate aapke paas se aaya nahi tha hamare paas.
Customer: Toh kya chahiye aapko kis cheez kaunse format me chahiye aisa kuch hai kya kuch?
Executive: Aap mujhe mail kar dijiye ek baar. Kya kya mail karna padega bataiye.
Customer: Nahi keh raha hu aap mujhe. Ji sir boliye boliye.
Customer: Nahi keh raha hu ki hume jo hai na ek ji hume jo hai na aap jaise wo images hai toh wo aapka original images hai aap ye keh rahe hai ki aapka original images hai IR wale ne jo kiya hai wo matlab wo sahi nahi hai, hai na sir? Wo images nahi wo aapke genuine hai, right sir?
Hmm.
Customer: Toh us original images ka jo hai usse aapke paas koi copyright toh hoga na ki ye mera images hai.
Customer: Matlab hamare ye hamari patented technology patented certificate hai hamare paas patent ka toh. Thik hai? Image toh hamara khud ka product hai toh matlab image ka kya trademark chahiye hamare product ka trademark kaise matlab kya chahiye exactly?
Executive: Trademark ka certificate aapke aap images wo trademark ka certificate aapke paas hai na available?
Customer: Nahi trademark ka certificate matlab wo mujhe bhi samajh me nahi aa raha ki aap exactly kya bol rahe ho.
Executive: Mai ye bata jo aapke IR technology wale hai usne jo hai na ek hamare paas concern raise kiya tha copyright ka issue tha. Thik hai? Usne jo hai na kuch product dala tha ki ye product hai jo copyright issue hai mera product hai aur wo product aapne uska jo images hai aur wo product product ko aap display kar rahe hai IndiaMART me. Thik hai? Wo ye claim kar rahe hai. Ab us copyright me aap nahi nahi unka nahi nahi unhone jo claim kiya hai na unki unka trademark certificate bataiye na hume ki unka kya trademark certificate hai aapne kis base pe unko wo kar diya hamara bandh?
Executive: Sir unhone share kiya hai aap bhi share kar sakte hai na agar aapke paas hai toh aap bhi ek baar share kar dijiye wo.
Customer: Nahi nahi mujhe toh mai mai ye jaanna chahta hu ki trademark certificate kya exactly aapko kya chahiye mujhe samajh me nahi aa raha isliye mai puch raha hu ki aisa matlab koi mujhe format ya matlab ye koi hai toh bataiye ki bhai ye aisa hota hai ye trademark certificate matlab sample sample. Sample kuch hai toh bataiye. Thoda time dijiye. Haan aap mujhe thoda time dijiye mai ek baar jo hai na apne legal team se ek baar confirm kar leta hu ki exactly isme kya kya certificate document chahiye aapke paas. Haan aise chahiye aur fir aap aap mujhe na iske concern me aap mujhe email bhi dal dijiye ki aapka is wajah se ye hua hai aapka ye aapki side se ye certificate chahiye ye matlab sample hai, thik hai? Wo aap mujhe wo aap mujhe provide kara dijiye. Matlab mai aapko abhi mail dalunga. Fir aap mujhe wo provide kara dijiye. Toh abhi mujhe apne legal team se ek baar baat karni padegi ki exactly isme kaise document chahiye. Thik hai yaar aap legal team se baat kar lijiye ek baar aur fir mujhe bataiye hai na. Thik hai? Ji. Thank you so much dhanyavaad. Thik hai. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's product is inactive due to IPR issue.

- Wants to know the exact trademark certificate needed.

- Wants to know the reason for the ban.



Resolution:

- Executive said the legal team raised concern.

- Executive will check and call back with details.

- Executive will email the required certificate sample.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after checking.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- ipr issue, trademark, certificate, inactive product
